# Shrieking Blast (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Sonic Spells|sonic]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a small steel ball)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** 40-ft.-radius burst

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Heroes of Battle (WotC)Â­, pg. 127

A *shrieking blast* is a deafening explosion of sonic power. Any creature in the area is permanently [[Deafened|deafened]] and takes 8d6 points of sonic damage. A successful save reduces the deafness to 1 round and reduces the damage by half.
